course_description: This course presents the history and multiple theories of translation, as well as basic methods/techniques and problems of translating between English and Spanish. A portion of class time will be devoted to translation practice and the comparison of multiple translations of a single text.
sections: Class Nbr: 4843, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 9:40-10:55a, Instructor: L. Dillman, Status: Open
